title: RIOT what do i do? please help
body:
So the picture shows the problem, i have played a game since the patch yesterday and then today i got this, i clicked Quit and then clicked launch as usual and the patched disappeared but the game didn't appear and then my computer would no longer do anything even the shut down function wouldn't work, (and its a powerful computer) so I'm scared of what will happen if i click ok
what should i do?
is this a RIOT thing or a virus/scam thing? as i have been getting a few randoms add me lately and tell me to boost my account or whatever and then disappear from my friends list without me even doing anything. so I'm a bit cautious atm

replies.body:
I got it too, i clicked quit instead of ok, havnt checked since Gimmie a sec...

EDIT: Scanned one file then said it scanned 0 files... Then it loaded something from 0% to 13% then stopped. Logged in fine.

I got this message.
My friend got it too.
You're not alone. Just an issue with the client, I guess. New issues with the patcher every patch. Its a bit ridiculous, but nothing to worry about.

I got it as well.... soooo... i think its a bug. (Azir)

Click "OK" i think it should be fine. After about 5 mins, my lol was up and running again.

-GL,HF
